ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Take it. You'll learn a lot and have fun in the process.
An overview of advanced machining and fabrication skills in a relaxed yet rigorous learning environment. Highly recommended!
If you are interested in welding, compression engines, or just mechanical engineering, this is the best hands on class at Yale.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Excellent for learning techniques for building experimental apparatuses. Was applicable in creating a fluid dynamics experiment for the Yale Microgravity Research Team.
Definitely a huge improvement to my mechanical fabrication skills.
This course gave me insight into the mechanical skills necessary to build devices for experimental research.
